value.title: Learn Starcraft - Build Orders Vs Zerg (Terran, Zerg & Protoss Build Guide)
value.excerpt: A build as each race versus Zerg! These are general build guides, not exact textbook orders, because no plan survives contact with the enemy! Timestamps: 0:15 - Terran vs Zerg 11:00 - Protoss vs Zerg 24:00 - Zerg vs Zerg

value.title: Learn Starcraft - Protoss v Zerg Build Order! (Updated 2018)
value.excerpt: A basic build to hold off and then defeat the disgusting Zerg! Meant for lower level players who have little direction, not for high level players looking for the dankest meta :) -- Watch live at https://www.twitch.tv/wintergaming

value.title: Learn Starcraft - SPEEDRUN TO MASTERS RANDOM | 30 Wins, 0 Losses - Terran, Zerg & Protoss
value.excerpt: Making sure to use safe, solid builds to get an advantage when playing smart! Most build orders I think could be copied to success for platinum/diamond players. value.title: Learn to play Starcraft - Zerg Beginner Guide #1 - Updated (2017)
value.excerpt: We go over the basic mechanics of zerg and show the importance of understanding at least some of what your opponent is doing.  This guide is meant for players with an understanding of the objectives of starcraft but without any strong direction or gameplan, especially for each specific race! -- Watch
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/UdFTRsXMG7w" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Learn to play Starcraft: Zerg Starter Guide #2 [BUILD ORDER] (Updated 2017 LOTV)
value.excerpt: We go over a very basic Zerg build order designed to get you into the midgame with a good economy and options. These guides are in no particular order, nor are they meant for COMPLETELY NEW (less than 10 games) players, instead are all meant to help improve generally!
